info.title: TIBCO FLOGO® Capability APIs
info.description: The API documentation for FLOGO capability on Data Plane for TIBCO Platform

get.description: List all flogo applications available on the dataplane

parameters.name: filterKey
parameters.description: Comma separated list of colums to filter the result. For example: name,namespace, state, version, tag

parameters.name: filterValue
parameters.description: Comma separated list of values to filter the result. For example: my-app,my-ns, Running, 1.0.0, tag1

get.description: List Application endpoints for provided App Id. The API returns details about public/private endpoint and ingress configuration for the public endpoint.

put.description: Scale an Application with provided replicas count for an App Id. Please avoid using scale operation when autoscaling is configured.
Modify or Create autoscaling configuration for an application. You can provide min/max replicas and CPU/memory thresholds for the HPA resource configuration

delete.description: Remove autoscaling configuration for an application.

put.description: Update the app properties without restarting the app instance if app property reconfigure is enabled uisng reconfigure management service like consul or aws

requestBody.description: A list of config in key value pair to update the app properties

put.summary: Enable or disable service mesh for an app
put.description: Enable or disable service mesh sidecar of the specified app id

get.description: List all Flogo application builds present on the Data Plane

parameters.name: filterKey
parameters.description: Comma separated list of colums to filter the result. For example: buildId, name

parameters.name: filterValue
parameters.description: Comma separated list of values to filter the result. For example: 0bb4dad, my-app-build

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Name of column to sort the result. For example: createdDate

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Order the result in asc or desc order

post.summary: Build flogo app using app.json or app.flogo file
post.description: Build app executable for given app.json or app.flogo file

parameters.name: baseVersion
parameters.description: Optional flogo base version, default will be read from app.json

parameters.name: os
parameters.description: Compatible operating system for app binary

parameters.name: arch
parameters.description: Compatible system architecture for app binary

put.summary: Import an App Build Zip file
put.description: Import an app build by uploading a build zip file

get.summary: Download app executable using build Id
get.description: Download app executable based on the existing buildId

parameters.name: buildId
parameters.description: build Id for which you want to download appplication binary

get.summary: List Application from Build Id on the dataplane
get.description: List all applications from Build Id on the dataplane

post.description: Deploy app using existing build Id

get.description: To get app.flogo or app.json for given Build Id
Export an app build for the provided build Id

get.summary: Generate values.yaml from an app Build
get.description: Generate values.yaml from an app Build for the provided Build Id

post.summary: Deploy an application Helm chart using values.yaml
post.description: Deploy or upgrade a TIBCO FLOGO® application Helm chart using values.yaml. An AppId inside values.yaml is mandatory for upgrading an existing application

parameters.name: retainFailedApp
parameters.description: Retain app release if failed during deployment. The app will be always retained for app upgrade flow

get.summary: Get helm chart values from FLOGO app deployment
get.description: Get helm chart values from FLOGO app deployment

put.summary: Update helm chart values for FLOGO app chart
put.description: Update helm chart values for FLOGO application chart. You can provide the values.yaml in the payload.

get.summary: Status of an Application Chart Deployment
get.description: Status of an Application deployment for an App Id.

get.summary: Release history of an Application Chart Deployment
get.description: Release history of an Application deployment for an App Id.

put.summary: Rollabck an Application helm chart Release
put.description: Rollabck an Application helm chart Release for an App Id and specified revision.
Rename an Application deployment. Warning: This action will uninstall existing release and re-install it with new name so it may cause service outage for clients

put.summary: Enable or disable service mesh for an app
put.description: Enable or disable service mesh sidecar of the specified app id
Modify or Create autoscaling configuration for an application. You can provide min/max replicas and CPU/memory thresholds for the HPA resource configuration

delete.description: Remove autoscaling configuration for an application.
Make an Application endpoint private. The API removes the Ingress resource to make and endpoint private.

post.description: Make an Application endpoint public. The API creates an Ingress resource with provided inputs - ingress class name, FQDN, path prefix, etc

get.summary: List Flogo connectors provisioned on Control Plane
get.description: List Flogo connectors provisioned on Control Plane

get.summary: List Flogo connectors provisioned on dataplane
get.description: List Flogo connectors provisioned on dataplane
List Supplements connectors provisioned on dataplane

get.summary: List Custom Extensions  provisioned on dataplane
get.description: List Custom Extensions provisioned on dataplane

get.summary: List Flogo Versions provisioned on the Control Plane
get.description: List Flogo Versions provisioned on Control Plane

get.summary: List Flogo Versions provisioned on dataplane
get.description: List Flogo Versions provisioned on dataplane

post.summary: Provision Flogo Version on the dataplane
post.description: Provision Flogo Version on the dataplane.

OAuth2Bearer.description: OAuth2 Bearer access token, is required to be set in the http Authorization header for API requests
